website_summaries.verdict: This tool lets you clip your pet's favorite snack to the top of your phone to get his attention. And it can fit over an Otterbox case.
pros: Lets you clip your dog's favorite toy or snack to top of smartphone or tablet
Works with both forward and rear-facing cameras
Clip fits over many phone cases, including Otterbox

customer_reviews.title: This is just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this advertised on Facebook or something like that and was super excited about it. Once I got it, I was a little disappointed to see how flimsy it was and that this didn't actually clip onto your phone. Since you can't clip it, it won't stay on my phone and I really can't use it. I take a lot of animal pictures at a humane society I volunteer at and was really looking forward to using this to help with the dogs, but it hasn't been helpful at all.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D

customer_reviews.title: Tried two treat holders for cameras. Both pretty worthless
customer_reviews.text: Kept this one as it will fit the camera with a treat for portrait photos QUICKLY!!! WILL NOT STAY ON IF YOU TURN THE CAMERA FOR A LANDSCAPE TO INCLUDE ALL THE ANIMALS. TOO MUCH TROUBLE TO RETURN. SAVE YOUR MONEY!! THERE WERE ONLY TWO TO TRY ON AMAZON AND NEITHER IS WORTH ANYTHING.
customer_reviews.author: owenswesties6

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest little gadget ever!
customer_reviews.text: Such a simple device, but it really works! I can never get my dogs to look at the camera or sit long enough to get a picture. They don’t miss the treat that’s there. Sat still and watched that little bone!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C

customer_reviews.title: Great for picture taking! Great value and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I wanted it it to do. Clips onto my phone really easily. Rubber material is flexible enough clip onto the phone as well as good a variety of different treats. I’ve used it for several different types of treats as thin as a beggin strip or thicker pieces like Freeze dried bison liver. I’ve used it for a few months and it’s been pretty durable. Haven’t seen any cracking or anything. Pretty sturdy on my phone. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Al Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Only for Super tiny treats
customer_reviews.text: Kinda works... its very small and does not fit bigger dog bones. And you have to take phone out of case which is kinda a pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Say CHEESE, Fido!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a novel yet simple idea that works wonderfully. I simply attached it to my phone (Samsung Galaxy s10). It snapped right on and even after waving it all around, it didn't show any signs of falling off. I put my dog's favorite treat in it, and then took many pictures. He stayed absolutely still with his eyes fixed on the treat (right above my camera). The pictures turned out wonderfully and he looks so photogenic. Thank you for this great, high-quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Miller

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit over a case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my dog focus on the camera when we selfie, especially on hikes. The problem is that this doesn’t fit over a phone that has a case on it - any case, of any thickness. And practically no one carries their phone around without a case as that is just asking to drop it and crack it. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: spartygirl87

customer_reviews.title: and snapped a great photo of him
customer_reviews.text: My mom's dog is an absolute wild child who always appears blurry in pictures because he can't stop moving! I stuck this little baby to the top of my phone with a treat, and snapped a great photo of him! I would definitely recommend this product to anyone trying to take a nice picture of their dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kate P

customer_reviews.title: Cutest purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely precious, we love it and it actually works! Even for our huge Trader Joe’s treats! I’ve also gotten so many hits on social media about it and am actually doing a fun giveaway and going to gift it to a fellow dog momma!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Sepulvado

customer_reviews.title: This works!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog (and cat) have an instagram account (@winstonandgypsy) and I'm constantly taking photos of them. This gadget WORKS! Just place a treat in the top after you slide it on your phone and instant photo success! Such a simple, easy to use tool helps me get great photos of my babies!
customer_reviews.author: lala76

customer_reviews.title: Thank you! Prize-winning item!
customer_reviews.text: First time we’ve managed to make precious pic of German Shepherd & Rottweiler together! What a creative idea and design is perfect for making the kind I’ve always hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: Francis & Linda Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Dogs always sit better for photos when they think a treat is involved. If you wanna get a great shot of your dog and they know the sit command, this will help.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah testa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make a difference with my dogs to be honest... never use.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a cool product, but my dogs still don't pay attention to the camera on my phone. Cute idea, but not worth the money. Possibly a cute gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Tough to find treats that work well with it.
customer_reviews.text: Cool for a couple uses and then it went into a junk drawer. Tough to find treats that fit.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as you'd expect, only fits very particular items in it and it doesn't hold things very well. Falls off phone easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to take pictures at a local humane society. It’s awesome, as they focus on the treat and I’m able to get great pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Here comes pupper pics!
customer_reviews.text: This might seem dumb, but the idea and the price are perfect! I haven’t tried it out with my pupper yet, but it does fit on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Migita

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I can never get my dog to look at the camera - and now I can get both to look at the same place at the same time! LOL! Love it. Ingenious!
customer_reviews.author: BarbL

customer_reviews.title: Save your coins
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for either of my dogs. Barely fit on my phone (Note 8) and they didn't care less that there was a treat right there.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Great little gift for the dog lover and works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I take a lot of photos of my dog so this was perfect to use to get him to look at the camera!
customer_reviews.author: D Cleaver

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole leithiser

customer_reviews.title: Works great even with thick phone case!
customer_reviews.text: Attaches well even with a thicker case (I have a lumee) and the treat stays in place. I used to try to wait out my dogs to end up with a picture where they look like they are “looking” and now it’s so much easier, love it!! Before and after photos to show the difference it makes!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Wenzel

customer_reviews.title: Could be so much better
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stay on my phone without a treat, let alone the added weight of a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Robin F.

customer_reviews.title: Only fits on very slim phone
customer_reviews.text: this was not made out of a durable rubber. My phone case was too big for it to fit snugly on and it fell off and was eaten by my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. VanZant

customer_reviews.title: Take better pics of your pet
customer_reviews.text: Helps get our fur baby’s attention for his instagram photos @rags_to_chico take a peak
customer_reviews.author: Yesika Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Worked well to get my pups pictures for Christmas card
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lake

customer_reviews.title: Need specific size...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with all treats, you have the specific size to fit. Would have been better if it was more of a clip.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Good thing this was free
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with my $10 off promotion from shopping at Whole Foods, when Amazon was running a promotion and this tool is not good. It didn't stay on my iphone and it had a hard time gripping treats. Maybe I haven't found the "right" treats or have the proper phone, but it did grab my dog's attention. I don't recommend to friends or family.
customer_reviews.author: Blasian

customer_reviews.title: Dog photos turn so well!
customer_reviews.text: We all want to take photos with our pets but they don’t always play along.. this really helps! Easy to use, works landscape or portrait mode, a tiny treat for your pet will catch its attention and.. voila! You became a professional pet photographer! :)
customer_reviews.author: HCF

customer_reviews.title: Say Woofie!
customer_reviews.text: The minute I started opening the package, my furbabies were in front of me. That's a bit unusual! Lol! I put the Woofie up and after a couple days tried it. They were so intent on the treat, I was able to get a great pic! My phone is in an Otterbox an i had no issues using this. I would recommend this to those that have busy furbabies! Say Woofie!
customer_reviews.author: jennajoey

customer_reviews.title: Gimmick
customer_reviews.text: Gimmick, dog still chased its tail and could care less.
customer_reviews.author: Ldub

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this for getting my pup to smile in pix but, unfortunately, it did not fit my iPhone-- with or without the case. The seller was great about returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: The only way to get my dog to even remotely sit still for a photo is with a treat. The Woofie makes it so much easier by attaching to your phone and holding the treat for you. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe someone is making a killing off this thing... which does exactly what it claims to do.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It was night when I used it. But still Fira photos of my dog looking into the camera. Can’t wait to take pictures in the daylight
customer_reviews.author: sassybrndy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit phone
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work. It wouldn’t stay on the top of my phone long enough to place a treat and take a picture. You are better off using a pop socket or other phone holder and using your other hand to hold the treat.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: This product does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: This is made of extremly flimsy soft rubber. I have a thin phone with a case and it won't work with nor with out the case. It does not grab on at all. If you move your phone or tilt even a tiny bit it falls right off. That is without any treat in it. It won't stay on any phone as ive tried several. I definitely would not recommend this as it does not serve outs purpose at all not even holding onto the phone. Wow very disappointed!!! Zero stars if it let me
customer_reviews.author: Kat Leach

customer_reviews.title: BEST.INVENTION.YET
customer_reviews.text: The WOOFIE is a genius invention. It’s so easy to use and holds all different kinds of treats- we use carrots! Whenever I take it out and put it on my phone I don’t even have to say anything- my dog just sit and stare at the treat. I am finally able to get high quality photos!! A must buy for anyone with a dog!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Genius!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! It really gets the pups to look at your phone while taking pics. I've already bought more as gifts. It helped me get this adorable photo!!
customer_reviews.author: aeb

customer_reviews.title: This is the only way I can get a good picture of my energetic pup
customer_reviews.text: This is the only way I can get a good picture of my energetic pup! We love it! It's a great size, and I just keep it in my purse now so I can grab it quickly. SO easy to use my 11 year old uses it more than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jennica Thompson

customer_reviews.title: We love it! We have 2 dogs and it’s impossible ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We have 2 dogs and it’s impossible to get a picture with them both looking at the camera until we got the woofie! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: The Woofie is an amazing invention!! Makes my pup want to look at the camera!! I would definitely recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is Great! Popped a treat in and my dog sat like a statue for some great portraits. Works just as advertised. Had no trouble using it and appears to be well made. I'm going to get a few and send to customers that I know are big pet lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Jack B Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Great dog pictures!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great!My grand dog looked right at treat in the woofie.... brilliant design and great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: carrie belew

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! I can finally get my little Schnauzer ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! I can finally get my little Schnauzer to take pictures for me. He's adorable, ya'll should meet him!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WOOFIE - The Pet Selfie & Portrait Tool (Glamour Green)
product_meta.description: Color:Glamour GreenIf you’ve ever struggled with taking a cute dog pic, Woofie is for you! Puppy photography has never been easier or more fun thanks to our incredible pet treat holder. Snap the best dog pictures with ease by putting a delicious treat right in front of your pooch’s eyes. Whether you love dog portrait photography or just taking a selfie with your favorite hound, a Woofie is absolutely indispensable. This is one phone accessory that will be a treat for you both and you’re sure to agree that it’s one of the best dog selfie tools out there. The Woofie is compatible with most smartphones and tablets and will be a great stocking stuffer for your pet!
feature_bullets: Easily attaches to your smartphone or tablet
Capture your pup’s attention while you snap away
Incredible results using forward or rear facing cameras
Works well with most phones and/or cases and your pet’s favorite treat
Small enough to fit in your pocket

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars131 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
